division.explanation: Write the name of the court division (like 'Honolulu', 'Waianae', etc.) where your case is being handled.

civil_number.explanation: Write the case number for your court case. You can find this on your court documents.

plaintiffs.explanation: Write the full name(s) of the person or people who started the case (the Plaintiff(s)).

defendants.explanation: Write the full name(s) of the person or people being sued (the Defendant(s)).

filing_party_info.explanation: Write the name and contact info of the person or attorney submitting this form (address, phone number, etc.).

next_court_date_time.explanation: Write the next court date and time if there is one. If not, write 'None'.

next_court_type.explanation: Select what type of court event was scheduled: Return, Pre-Trial, Trial, Answer, or something else.

dismissal_type.explanation: Choose one: 'WITH prejudice' (case is closed and can't be refiled), or 'WITHOUT prejudice' (case can be refiled later).

partial_dismissal_defendant.explanation: If you're only dismissing the case against one or some defendants, write their name(s) here.

full_dismissal_confirmed.explanation: Check this if you are dismissing all claims against all parties and ending the case completely.

plaintiff_signature_date.explanation: Write the date when the Plaintiff (or their lawyer) signs this form.

plaintiff_signature.explanation: Signature of the Plaintiff or their lawyer.

plaintiff_printed_name.explanation: Print or type the name of the Plaintiff or their lawyer.

defendant_signature_date.explanation: Write the date when the Defendant (or their lawyer) signs this form.

defendant_signature.explanation: Signature of the court clerk who is issuing this order.
